name: Out Of The Toy Box
description:
Do you like feeling like a badass while going zoom?! Well its a bit early to tell but we think it feels pretty cool. You can help us develop and refine our game until its something both fun to play and to speedrun.

Check out development here: 

Our current goal is to refine the gameplay loop so that everything feels solid, laying the groundwork for us to create fun and intresting levels that challenge players to compete to get the best time possiable. (oh and uhh nice graphics, that would help.
